title: Amazon packages
content: Are we allowed to get packages (Amazon/other couriers) delivered to college?

comments.body: I'm assuming you're not in hostel. I've done it once. They let in couriers. This is EC. Idk about RR.

For RR campus: Yes you are allowed to..

All forms of packages/couriers etc are allowed to Be Block Entrance and Hostel. Food is allowed only till the main gate/back gate
Yep not in the hostel. Did you have to collect from the reception (assuming you were in class when it was delivered)?
Ah I'm in the EC campus. Thanks man :)
Wasn't that brave. I excused myself from class and collected it myself. Their delivery to office has a pre selected time ig. I put it around classes where they'd let me out if I asked.
